reference.title: Cluster pair details
reference.shortdesc: The Cluster Pairs page on the Data Protection tab provides information about clusters that have been paired or are in the process of being paired. The system displays pairing and progress messages in the Status column.

keywords.indexterm: replicationcluster pair detailsviewing cluster pair details

dlentry.dd: A system-generated ID given to each cluster pair.
The name of the other cluster in the pair.
The management virtual IP address of the other cluster in the pair.
Replication status of the remote cluster
The number of volumes contained by the cluster that are paired for replication.
A unique ID given to each cluster in the pair.
